strapiPost.title: Springdale Celebrates Groundbreaking Of New Park
strapiPost.content:
Join the Downtown Springdale Alliance and the City of Springdale as they celebrate the groundbreaking of the new Luther George Park tomorrow, Oct 7, at 11a. 

  • Parks on parks: Construction on Luther George Park will take place at 300 Park St in Springdale, offering another great park to the Downtown Springdale area. 
  • Park party: The groundbreaking celebration will include food from some of Springdale's best restaurants and entertainment and programming from the Latin Art Organization of Arkansas, the Arkansas Coalition of Marshallese, and Lisa Academy.

Keep up with info on the event HERE.
